languages.text: {n}Лицо техножреца суровеет, и он загадочно добавляет:{/n} "Устами владыки Омниссия вручает мне алгоритм исправления ошибок и торжествования в служении. И я исправлю, и я восторжествую".

{n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо техножреца суровеет, и он загадочно добавляет:{/n} "Устами владыки Омниссия вручает мне алгоритм исправления ошибок и торжествования в служении. И я исправлю, и я восторжествую".

traits.locale_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

{n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

{n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

{n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

{n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

languages.text: {n}Dann verhärtet sich sein Blick und er fügt kryptisch hinzu{/n} "Den Worten meines Mentors zufolge gewährt mir der Omnissiah den Algorithmus für Erlösung und Triumph in der Erfüllung meiner Pflicht. Ich werde Erlösung finden und triumphieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dann verhärtet sich sein Blick und er fügt kryptisch hinzu{/n} "Den Worten meines Mentors zufolge gewährt mir der Omnissiah den Algorithmus für Erlösung und Triump in der Erfüllung meiner Pflicht. Ich werde Erlösung finden und triumphieren."

languages.text: {n}Puis son expression se durcit et il ajoute sur un ton énigmatique :{/n} « Avec les mots de mon mentor, l'Omnimessie me confère l'algorithme de la rédemption et du triomphe à son service. Je serai sauvé, et je triompherai. »
languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Puis son expression se durcit et il ajoute sur un ton énigmatique :{/n} « Avec les mots de mon mentor, l'Omnimessie me confère l'algorithme de la rédemption et du triomphe à son service. Je serai sauvé, et je triompherai. »

languages.text: {n}随后，他的表情变得更加严肃，神秘地补充了一句。{/n}“有了导师的教诲，欧姆尼塞亚已经赐予了我救赎与胜利的算法。我一定会寻得救赎，获得胜利。”
languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，他的表情变得更加严肃，神秘地补充了一句。{/n}“有了导师的教诲，欧姆尼塞亚已经赐予了我救赎与胜利的算法。我一定会寻得救赎，获得胜利。”

languages.text: {n}すると彼の表情が硬くなり、不可解な言葉を付け加えた。{/n}「師の言葉とともに、万機神は自分に奉仕における贖罪のアルゴリズムと勝利を授けてくださった。自分は赦され、勝利するのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}すると彼の表情が硬くなり、謎かけのように言った。{/n}「私の師の言葉とともに、万機神は私に奉仕における贖罪のアルゴリズムと勝利を授けた。私は赦され、勝利するのだ」

languages.text: {n}Luego su expresión se endurece y añade crípticamente:{/n} «Como suele decir mi mentor, el Omnissiah me ofrece el algoritmo para la redención y el triunfo en el servicio. Me redimiré y triunfaré».
languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Luego su expresión se endurece y añade crípticamente:{/n} «Como suele decir mi mentor, el Omnissiah me ofrece el algoritmo para la redención y el triunfo en el servicio. Me redimiré y triunfaré».

languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

languages.text: {n}Derken yüz ifadesi sertleşiyor ve esrarengiz bir edayla ekliyor.{/n} "Yönderimin de dediği gibi, Hermesih bana arınmanın ve hizmette zaferin algoritmasını sunar. Günahlarımdan arınıp zafere ereceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Then his expression hardens, and he adds cryptically,{/n} "With my mentor's words, the Omnissiah gives me the algorithm for redemption and triumph in service. I will be redeemed, and I will triumph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derken yüz ifadesi sertleşiyor ve esrarengiz bir edayla ekliyor:{/n} "Mentorumun da dediği gibi, Hermesih bana arınmanın ve hizmette zaferin algoritmasını sunar. Günahlarımdan arınıp zafere ereceğim."
